content.html: Got email from Spotify asking to move one of my video podcasts to Spotify (as they are getting into video). Of course, I say. Here's the RSS feed. They say "In order to ...video podcast on Spotify you need to switch from your current hosting to Anchor. " WAT? It's RSS.
content.value:
Got email from Spotify asking to move one of my video podcasts to Spotify (as they are getting into video). Of course, I say. Here's the RSS feed. 

They say "In order to ...video podcast on Spotify you need to switch from your current hosting to Anchor. "

WAT? It's RSS.
